vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to the professional services contract with Brown Reynolds Watford Architects, Inc. for additional architectural and engineering services for the Dallas Water Utilities (DWU) Distribution Service Center at Scottsdale Avenue and DWU Service Center at 12000 Greenville Avenue - Not to exceed $692,391.00, from $2,956,045.00 to $3,648,436.00 - Financing: Wastewater Construction Fund ($412,391.00) and Water Construction Fund ($280,000.00)
